name: xernerx-poster
description: An extension for the xernerx framework to post bot stats to numerous bot listing sites.
author: Dummi

scripts.start: npm i && npm audit fix --force && npm fund && npm link && tsc -w
scripts.patch: npm run write && git add . && npm run commit && npm version patch && npm publish && git push
scripts.minor: npm run write && git add . && npm run commit && npm version minor && npm publish && git push
scripts.major: npm run write && git add . && npm run commit && npm version major && npm publish && git push
scripts.site: git add docs && npm run commit && git push
scripts.build: tsc && npx tsup src/main.ts && npx prettier --write src
